member.name: M:DigitBridge.CommerceCentral.WebApi.SwaggerController.SwaggerOAuth2Redirect(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,AzureFunctions.Extensions.Swashbuckle.ISwashBuckleClient)
member.summary: This is only needed for OAuth2 client. This redirecting document is normally served as a static content. Functions don't provide this out of the box, so we serve it here. Don't forget to set OAuth2RedirectPath configuration option to reflect this route.
